Auxiliary functions

Incertus.label — Method

Function sets a label for a randomization procedure. An example:

julia> w = [1, 2, 3, 4]
4-element Vector{Int64}:
 1
 2
 3
 4

julia> dlr_proc = DLR(w, 2)
DLR(2): restricted randomization procedure, targeting 1:2:3:4 allocation in 4-arm trial.

julia> label(dlr_proc)
"DLR(2)"
source
